data.message: Apparently this feature sucks. I've seen a fee of my FBF with theirs and saw mine but can't figure out how to create my own. Does anyone know?? I'd appreciate some tips. Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Gary. You can create your own Year in Review by selecting “See Your Year” from the top of your News Feed. You can also access your Year in Review by viewing a friend's Year in Review on their Timeline or by visiting facebook.com/yearinreview. -Hailey
Thx Hailey - I appreciate it and will try creating my own timeline. Happy New Year.
